description:
Picnicking with an Opinel just got a lot easier. Add a fork and spoon to your beloved Opinel No. 08 pocketknife. This clever fork and spoon insert locks into the No. 08 pocketknife with the same lock ring used to secure the blade.

  • Designed in collaboration with Franck Fontana, this clever little kit is easy to use and easy to bring along
  • Sandvik stainless steel construction is a mix of straight and serrated for cutting versatility
  • Works with Opinel No. 08 pocketknife (not included)
  • Microfibre travel case/napkin included
name: Opinel Picnic+ Fork/Spoon/Napkin
